name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Joseph Allen JAFFE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Jaffe

judges: Mr. Justice Baer did not participate in this matter.
parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Joseph Allen JAFFE, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30th day of March, 2004, there having been filed with this Court by Joseph Allen Jaffe his verified Statement of Resignation dated January 26, 2004, stating that he desires to resign from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E., it is
ORDERED that the resignation of Joseph Men Jaffe be and it is hereby accepted and he is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and it is further ORDERED that he shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
Mr. Justice Baer did not participate in this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
847 A.2d 668
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Joseph Allen JAFFE, Respondent
No. 857 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 30, 2004.
